In a vibrant jungle, there lived a playful monkey named Miko who adored swinging from the highest branches. One day, a fierce storm swept through, snapping his favorite swing. Heartbroken, Miko sat on the ground, feeling lost. His friends, noticing his sadness, rallied together to cheer him up. They crafted a new swing using vines and sturdy branches. With each swing, Miko rediscovered joy, realizing that while his old swing was gone, the love and creativity of his friends had created something even better. From that day on, Miko learned that happiness often comes from the bonds we share, not just our possessions.
